MistressOfSouls.synopsis: Default dialogue with Krustine, Mistress of Souls, who has just blessed some Skull Lashers in the Colony Barracks. (Myrkulite)
MistressOfSouls.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/SCL_Main_A- Go to the Colony Barracks with "goto 728 16 14"- Let the Mistress of Souls finish blessing the Skull Lashers. Do not come too close or interfere.- Talk to Krustine, Mistress of Souls, after the blessing AD has finished.- If you attacked Ketheric on the Moonrise rooftop before coming to Colony, the Myrkulites will be hostile to you on sight.

AD_SkullLasher_002_Combat.synopsis: Ironfinger, a female halfling, one of three Skull Lashers in the Colony Barracks, combat AD. Played only once.
AD_SkullLasher_002_Combat.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/SCL_Main_A- Go to the Colony Barracks using the debugbook- Engage Krustine and her Skull Lashers in combat- Ironfinger will say this AD when she gets the chance. Each Myrkulite here will get the chance to say their own AD in each combat round (after everyone has had a turn). They will only be able to play this AD once.

AD_SkullLasher_003_Combat.synopsis: Magthew Budj, a human male, one of three Skull Lashers in the Colony Barracks, combat AD. Played only once.
AD_SkullLasher_003_Combat.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/SCL_Main_A- Go to the Colony Barracks using the debugbook- Engage Krustine and her Skull Lashers in combat- Magthew Budj will say this AD when he gets the chance. Each Myrkulite here will get the chance to say their own AD in each combat round (after everyone has had a turn). They will only be able to play this AD once.

AD_MistressOfSouls_GoForth.synopsis: Krustine, Mistress of Souls in the Colony Barracks, sends the Skull Lashers on their way to prepare for the march on Baldur's Gate. Played only once.
AD_MistressOfSouls_GoForth.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/SCL_Main_A- Go to the Colony Barracks using the debugbook- Approach Krustine and the Skull Lashers - don't get too close or interrupt the blessing, but let it complete.- You can also interrupt the blessing and take your way out of it.- After this, they will move on into their behaviours - Krustine will send the Skull Lashers on their way with this AD

AD_SkullLasher_001_Combat.synopsis: Hairy Henry, one of three Skull Lashers in the Colony Barracks, combat AD. Played only once.
AD_SkullLasher_001_Combat.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/SCL_Main_A- Go to the Colony Barracks using the debugbook- Engage Krustine and her Skull Lashers in combat- Hairy Henry, the bugbear, will say this AD when he gets the chance. Each Myrkulite here will get the chance to say their own AD in each combat round (after everyone has had a turn). They will only be able to play this AD once.

AD_SkullLasher_001_Prayer.synopsis: Hairy Henry, a male bugbear, one of three Skull Lashers in the Colony Barracks, repeated behaviour AD for when he is praying to Myrkul. He is preparing for war in the Absolute's army.
AD_SkullLasher_001_Prayer.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/SCL_Main_A- Go to the Colony Barracks using the debugbook- Approach Krustine and her Skull Lashers and wait until the blessing ceremony is over (or trespass and tell her you're a True Soul).- Hairy Henry will say this AD while he is praying at a shrine to Myrkul in his room in the Barracks. It will be repeated every time he gets to the shrine.

AD_MistressOfSouls_Combat.synopsis: Krustine, Mistress of Souls in the Colony Barracks, combat AD. Played only once.
AD_MistressOfSouls_Combat.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/SCL_Main_A- Go to the Colony Barracks using the debugbook- Engage Krustine and her Skull Lashers in combat- Krustine will say this AD when she gets the chance. Each Myrkulite here will get the chance to say their own AD in each combat round (after everyone has had a turn). They will only be able to play this AD once.

MistressOfSouls_HighAlert.synopsis: If you attacked Ketheric on the rooftop of Moonrise Tower, the Myrkulites in the Colony Barracks will be on high alert. If she spots you, she will assume you are one of the traitors that attacked Ketheric - but you can try to convince her otherwise.
MistressOfSouls_HighAlert.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/SCL_Main_A- Use ReCon command "oe barracks_assault"- Go to the Colony Barracks with the debugbook options.- Get spotted by Krustine, Mistress of Souls (don't get spotted as the Dark Urge character).

AD_SkullLasher_002_AttackDummy.synopsis: Ironfinger, a female halfling, one of three Skull Lashers in the Colony Barracks, repeated behaviour AD for when she is attacking an attack dummy. She is preparing for war in the Absolute's army.
AD_SkullLasher_002_AttackDummy.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/SCL_Main_A- Go to the Colony Barracks using the debugbook- Approach Krustine and her Skull Lashers and wait until the blessing ceremony is over (or trespass and tell her you're a True Soul).- Ironfinger will say this AD while she is attacking a training dummy in her room in the Barracks. It will be repeated every time she gets to the dummy.

SkullLasher_002.synopsis: Default dialogue with Ironfinger, one of the Skull Lashers in the Colony Barracks. Overseen by Krustine, Mistress of Souls. Shouldn't have too much to say. A female halfling. (Myrkulite)
SkullLasher_002.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/SCL_Main_A- Go to the Colony Barracks with "goto 728 16 14"- Let the Mistress of Souls finish blessing the Skull Lashers. Do not come too close or interfere.- Talk to Ironfinger after Krustine's blessing AD has finished.- If you attacked Ketheric on the Moonrise rooftop before coming to Colony, the Myrkulites will be hostile to you on sight.

SkullLasher_001.synopsis: Default dialogue with Hairy Henry, one of the Skull Lashers in the Colony Barracks. Overseen by Krustine, Mistress of Souls. Shouldn't have too much to say. A male bugbear. (Myrkulite)
SkullLasher_001.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/SCL_Main_A- Go to the Colony Barracks with "goto 728 16 14"- Let the Mistress of Souls finish blessing the Skull Lashers. Do not come too close or interfere.- Talk to Hairy Henry after Krustine's blessing AD has finished.- If you attacked Ketheric on the Moonrise rooftop before coming to Colony, the Myrkulites will be hostile to you on sight.

MistressOfSouls_RecognizeDarkUrge.synopsis: Krustine, the Mistress of Souls in the Colony Barracks, recognizes the Dark Urge.She previously watched over the Dark Urge in their pod and became obsessed with them.
MistressOfSouls_RecognizeDarkUrge.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/SCL_Main_A- Use ReCon command "oe barracks_assault"- Use the origin debugbook to recruit the Dark Urge (Ctrl+Shift+7 - More... - Dark Urge ...)- The Dark Urge gets spotted by Krustine, Mistress of Souls

AD_Blessing.synopsis: Krustine, Mistress of Souls, is blessing three Skull Lashers in the Colony Barracks. This AD can be interrupted.
AD_Blessing.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/SCL_Main_A- Go to the Colony Barracks with "goto 728 16 14"- Approach the Mistress of Souls from a distance - she will start blessing the Skull Lashers. Do not come too close or interfere.

MistressOfSouls_InterruptBlessing.synopsis: Reaction to interrupting Krustine's blessing ceremony in the Colony Barracks. She is blessing three Skull Lashers, and approaching or interrupting will cause her to interrogate you.
MistressOfSouls_InterruptBlessing.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/SCL_Main_A- Go to the Colony Barracks with "goto 728 16 14"- Let the Mistress of Souls finish blessing the Skull Lashers. Do not come too close or interfere.- Talk to Krustine, Mistress of Souls, after the blessing AD has finished.- If you attacked Ketheric on the Moonrise rooftop before coming to Colony, the Myrkulites will be hostile to you on sight.

SkullLasher_003.synopsis: Default dialogue with Magthew Budj, one of the Skull Lashers in the Colony Barracks. Overseen by Krustine, Mistress of Souls. Shouldn't have too much to say. A male human. (Myrkulite)"One man's typo is another man's fantasy name".
SkullLasher_003.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/SCL_Main_A- Go to the Colony Barracks with "goto 728 16 14"- Let the Mistress of Souls finish blessing the Skull Lashers. Do not come too close or interfere.- Talk to Magthew Budj after Krustine's blessing AD has finished.- If you attacked Ketheric on the Moonrise rooftop before coming to Colony, the Myrkulites will be hostile to you on sight.

MistressOfSouls_9.speaker: Kressa Bonedaughter
MistressOfSouls_9.text: You are on sanctified ground. Speak only if you must.

MistressOfSouls_15.speaker: Kressa Bonedaughter
MistressOfSouls_15.text: It is not my blessing - I am merely a vessel for our Lord Myrkul's will.

MistressOfSouls_4.speaker: Kressa Bonedaughter
MistressOfSouls_4.text: It is not my blessing to give - I am merely a vessel for our Lord Myrkul's will.

MistressOfSouls_2.speaker: Kressa Bonedaughter
MistressOfSouls_2.text: And he does not deem you worthy of his dread touch.

MistressOfSouls_3.speaker: Kressa Bonedaughter
MistressOfSouls_3.text: It is not my blessing, True Soul. I am merely a vessel for our Lord Myrkul's will.

MistressOfSouls_14.speaker: Kressa Bonedaughter
MistressOfSouls_14.text: His shadow falls across you. Go forth and reap.

AD_Minthara_EnteredBarracks_0.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
AD_Minthara_EnteredBarracks_0.text: Some who worked here were not thralls or undead. They were loyal to Ketheric and his grim cause.

AD_SkullLasher_002_Combat_0.speaker: Ironfinger
AD_SkullLasher_002_Combat_0.text: I will toast a goblet of your blood after you're dead!

AD_SkullLasher_003_Combat_0.speaker: Maghtew Budj
AD_SkullLasher_003_Combat_0.text: I shall make sweet music of your screams!

AD_MistressOfSouls_GoForth_0.speaker: Kressa Bonedaughter
AD_MistressOfSouls_GoForth_0.text: Gather yourselves - soon, we march to victory.

AD_SkullLasher_001_Combat_0.speaker: Hairy Henry
AD_SkullLasher_001_Combat_0.text: You will beg for death long before we grant it!

AD_SkullLasher_001_Prayer_0.speaker: Hairy Henry
AD_SkullLasher_001_Prayer_0.text: All that live are yours, Myrkul. Let us hasten them on their journey.
AD_SkullLasher_001_Prayer_0.context: NodeContext: praying to the god of death

AD_SkullLasher_001_Prayer_1.speaker: Hairy Henry
AD_SkullLasher_001_Prayer_1.text: Their cities shall become charnel houses.
AD_SkullLasher_001_Prayer_1.context: NodeContext: praying to the god of death

AD_SkullLasher_001_Prayer_2.speaker: Hairy Henry
AD_SkullLasher_001_Prayer_2.text: We are yours, Lord of Bones, in this life and the eternity that follows.
AD_SkullLasher_001_Prayer_2.context: NodeContext: praying to the god of death

AD_SkullLasher_001_Prayer_3.speaker: Hairy Henry
AD_SkullLasher_001_Prayer_3.text: Bring dusk, bring night. Bring death.
AD_SkullLasher_001_Prayer_3.context: NodeContext: praying to the god of death

AD_MistressOfSouls_Combat_0.speaker: Kressa Bonedaughter
AD_MistressOfSouls_Combat_0.text: Not even the worms will want your carcass once I'm done with you!

MistressOfSouls_HighAlert_11.speaker: Kressa Bonedaughter
MistressOfSouls_HighAlert_11.text: General Thorm was attacked, the order to evacuate given. You should not be here. I conclude you are one of the attackers.
MistressOfSouls_HighAlert_11.context: NodeContext: Suspicious. Believes she's caught a would-be assassin

MistressOfSouls_HighAlert_3.speaker: Player
MistressOfSouls_HighAlert_3.text: You should be careful, throwing such accusations at a True Soul.

MistressOfSouls_HighAlert_5.speaker: Kressa Bonedaughter
MistressOfSouls_HighAlert_5.text: Trying to pull rank? And yet not a word of concern for our dear General.
MistressOfSouls_HighAlert_5.context: NodeContext: Unswayed. Convinced the player is a traitor

MistressOfSouls_HighAlert_4.speaker: Player
MistressOfSouls_HighAlert_4.text: This is a misunderstanding. I was sent to support you with the eradication of these traitors.

MistressOfSouls_HighAlert_8.speaker: Kressa Bonedaughter
MistressOfSouls_HighAlert_8.text: I have no need for a thrall - you would merely get in the way.

MistressOfSouls_HighAlert_6.speaker: Kressa Bonedaughter
MistressOfSouls_HighAlert_6.text: Go find Balthazar - he always has use for another body.

MistressOfSouls_HighAlert_10.speaker: Kressa Bonedaughter
MistressOfSouls_HighAlert_10.text: Go on, make yourself useful somewhere. If you cannot manage that, just stay out of the way.

MistressOfSouls_HighAlert_1.speaker: Kressa Bonedaughter
MistressOfSouls_HighAlert_1.context: NodeContext: Unswayed. Convinced the player is a traitor

MistressOfSouls_HighAlert_0.speaker: Kressa Bonedaughter
MistressOfSouls_HighAlert_0.text: I shall present your bones to General Thorm as retribution for what you did to him.

AD_SkullLasher_002_AttackDummy_0.speaker: Ironfinger
AD_SkullLasher_002_AttackDummy_0.context: NodeContext: attacking a training dummy and commenting after a blow has been struck

AD_SkullLasher_002_AttackDummy_1.speaker: Ironfinger
AD_SkullLasher_002_AttackDummy_1.context: NodeContext: attacking a training dummy and commenting after a blow has been struck

AD_SkullLasher_002_AttackDummy_2.speaker: Ironfinger
AD_SkullLasher_002_AttackDummy_2.text: We will reap the Sword Coast.
AD_SkullLasher_002_AttackDummy_2.context: NodeContext: attacking a training dummy and commenting after a blow has been struck

AD_SkullLasher_002_AttackDummy_3.speaker: Ironfinger
AD_SkullLasher_002_AttackDummy_3.text: A shame it has no bones to break.
AD_SkullLasher_002_AttackDummy_3.context: NodeContext: attacking a training dummy and commenting after a blow has been struck

SkullLasher_002_0.speaker: Ironfinger
SkullLasher_002_0.text: We are fortunate to live in the end-times. Pray with me.

SkullLasher_002_1.speaker: Ironfinger
SkullLasher_002_1.text: The end is coming - do you feel it?

SkullLasher_001_0.speaker: Hairy Henry
SkullLasher_001_0.text: Heed the Mistress. She is blessed.

MistressOfSouls_RecognizeDarkUrge_37.speaker: Narrator
MistressOfSouls_RecognizeDarkUrge_37.text: *She is but the hack-doctor who half-pieced you together, after whatever caused your head to get in this mess.*

MistressOfSouls_RecognizeDarkUrge_29.speaker: Narrator
MistressOfSouls_RecognizeDarkUrge_29.text: *Someone else must have attacked you, in the midst of whatever you were doing down here.*

MistressOfSouls_RecognizeDarkUrge_47.speaker: Narrator
MistressOfSouls_RecognizeDarkUrge_47.text: *This necromancer was a grunt in the scheme of the horrors enacted against you. That attacker is the source.*

MistressOfSouls_RecognizeDarkUrge_51.speaker: Narrator
MistressOfSouls_RecognizeDarkUrge_51.text: *In the heart of all these membranes, there was a dagger awaiting you all along. But from who?*

MistressOfSouls_RecognizeDarkUrge_54.speaker: GROUP_ORI_DU
MistressOfSouls_RecognizeDarkUrge_54.text: Ponder why you were down here before.

MistressOfSouls_RecognizeDarkUrge_13.speaker: Narrator
MistressOfSouls_RecognizeDarkUrge_13.text: *You were no Myrkul cultist, that much is sure. You sense in your soul you were something far greater.*

MistressOfSouls_RecognizeDarkUrge_14.speaker: GROUP_ORI_DU
MistressOfSouls_RecognizeDarkUrge_14.text: Scowl: She didn't do a great job of fixing me.

MistressOfSouls_RecognizeDarkUrge_10.speaker: Narrator
MistressOfSouls_RecognizeDarkUrge_10.text: *Her experiments may well have made the damage worse.*

MistressOfSouls_RecognizeDarkUrge_60.speaker: Kressa Bonedaughter
MistressOfSouls_RecognizeDarkUrge_60.text: Urgh, Lashers, Balthazar let one of his walking carcasses lapse from his control... Let's ferry them back.

MistressOfSouls_RecognizeDarkUrge_7.speaker: Kressa Bonedaughter
MistressOfSouls_RecognizeDarkUrge_7.text: Wait... By the Bone Lord, it's you!

MistressOfSouls_RecognizeDarkUrge_30.speaker: Kressa Bonedaughter
MistressOfSouls_RecognizeDarkUrge_30.text: I thought I'd never see you again ...
MistressOfSouls_RecognizeDarkUrge_30.context: NodeContext: Overjoyed, happy to see you again

MistressOfSouls_RecognizeDarkUrge_23.speaker: Kressa Bonedaughter
MistressOfSouls_RecognizeDarkUrge_23.text: I wanted to keep you for myself but they shipped you away.

MistressOfSouls_RecognizeDarkUrge_6.speaker: GROUP_ORI_DU
MistressOfSouls_RecognizeDarkUrge_6.text: I don't know what you're talking about, but you're going to tell me everything.

MistressOfSouls_RecognizeDarkUrge_39.speaker: Kressa Bonedaughter
MistressOfSouls_RecognizeDarkUrge_39.text: You talk? How is that possible? Something must've gone wrong.

MistressOfSouls_RecognizeDarkUrge_25.speaker: GROUP_ORI_DU
MistressOfSouls_RecognizeDarkUrge_25.text: Keep me? What did you do to me?

MistressOfSouls_RecognizeDarkUrge_28.speaker: Kressa Bonedaughter
MistressOfSouls_RecognizeDarkUrge_28.text: You talk? And you are aware? How is that possible?

MistressOfSouls_RecognizeDarkUrge_17.speaker: Kressa Bonedaughter
MistressOfSouls_RecognizeDarkUrge_17.text: Oh, but what an arresting voice you have!

MistressOfSouls_RecognizeDarkUrge_57.speaker: Kressa Bonedaughter
MistressOfSouls_RecognizeDarkUrge_57.text: You're not supposed to be here, special one. That's not right. But I don't want to damage you.

MistressOfSouls_RecognizeDarkUrge_43.speaker: Kressa Bonedaughter
MistressOfSouls_RecognizeDarkUrge_43.text: You were my very first, after all. I learnt everything about the parasites from you.

MistressOfSouls_RecognizeDarkUrge_1.speaker: Kressa Bonedaughter
MistressOfSouls_RecognizeDarkUrge_1.text: I remember finding you close to death, beaten black and blue on the floor of this sanctum. It must have been a few hours after the tadpole was placed in your skull.

MistressOfSouls_RecognizeDarkUrge_42.speaker: Kressa Bonedaughter
MistressOfSouls_RecognizeDarkUrge_42.text: How you got here was a total mystery, but I stitched you up just enough to keep you alive, then placed you within your crib.

MistressOfSouls_RecognizeDarkUrge_15.speaker: Kressa Bonedaughter
MistressOfSouls_RecognizeDarkUrge_15.text: I kept you as mine until you were needed by our superiors.

MistressOfSouls_RecognizeDarkUrge_53.speaker: Kressa Bonedaughter
MistressOfSouls_RecognizeDarkUrge_53.text: We had such a close bond. I opened you up endlessly with my scalpels, and got lost in your insides.

MistressOfSouls_RecognizeDarkUrge_12.speaker: GROUP_ORI_DU
MistressOfSouls_RecognizeDarkUrge_12.text: This is where I was left after someone infected me?

MistressOfSouls_RecognizeDarkUrge_48.speaker: Kressa Bonedaughter
MistressOfSouls_RecognizeDarkUrge_48.text: I was not behind it - I do not know. But whoever did it, I'm so glad they left you here for me.

MistressOfSouls_RecognizeDarkUrge_20.speaker: GROUP_ORI_DU
MistressOfSouls_RecognizeDarkUrge_20.text: I was 'needed' in the Absolute's plan? For what?

MistressOfSouls_RecognizeDarkUrge_3.speaker: Kressa Bonedaughter
MistressOfSouls_RecognizeDarkUrge_3.text: The most important work, the nature of which I only heard whispers of.

MistressOfSouls_RecognizeDarkUrge_22.speaker: Kressa Bonedaughter
MistressOfSouls_RecognizeDarkUrge_22.text: Truthfully, I'm not surprised to see you found your way back here all by yourself. I always knew you were clever.

MistressOfSouls_RecognizeDarkUrge_19.speaker: Kressa Bonedaughter
MistressOfSouls_RecognizeDarkUrge_19.text: It has never been the same with another... All the other victims who come here just meekly obey. You thrashed, you fought, you were indomitable.

MistressOfSouls_RecognizeDarkUrge_46.speaker: Kressa Bonedaughter
MistressOfSouls_RecognizeDarkUrge_46.text: But as special as you are, you shouldn't be swanning around here, acting as if free will is yours again.

MistressOfSouls_RecognizeDarkUrge_49.speaker: Kressa Bonedaughter
MistressOfSouls_RecognizeDarkUrge_49.text: We're going to kill you, sweet one. But I promise I will stay with you afterwards.

MistressOfSouls_RecognizeDarkUrge_33.speaker: Kressa Bonedaughter
MistressOfSouls_RecognizeDarkUrge_33.text: Lashers... bring this one back to my table! And prepare my knives for a long night of experiments!

MistressOfSouls_RecognizeDarkUrge_31.speaker: GROUP_ORI_DU
MistressOfSouls_RecognizeDarkUrge_31.text: You will die for what you did to me.

MistressOfSouls_RecognizeDarkUrge_32.speaker: Kressa Bonedaughter
MistressOfSouls_RecognizeDarkUrge_32.text: Bone Lord... you're the perfect being... All that is unnecessary stripped away... Primal... innocent... pure...

MistressOfSouls_RecognizeDarkUrge_40.speaker: GROUP_ORI_DU
MistressOfSouls_RecognizeDarkUrge_40.text: Who was I to you when I was here? Before I was infected?

MistressOfSouls_RecognizeDarkUrge_5.speaker: GROUP_ORI_DU
MistressOfSouls_RecognizeDarkUrge_5.text: Play dumb - let her believe you lost your wits along with your memory.

MistressOfSouls_RecognizeDarkUrge_8.speaker: Kressa Bonedaughter
MistressOfSouls_RecognizeDarkUrge_8.text: Poor, stupid thing. Why is it even here? I thought we sent its pod away so it could be used elsewhere.

MistressOfSouls_RecognizeDarkUrge_45.speaker: Kressa Bonedaughter
MistressOfSouls_RecognizeDarkUrge_45.text: Adorable... I did miss it. Its simplicity, its fear, it thrashing its own head against its pod, cracking its skull again and again in a futile attempt to escape.

MistressOfSouls_RecognizeDarkUrge_58.speaker: Kressa Bonedaughter
MistressOfSouls_RecognizeDarkUrge_58.text: How precious - sweeter than any person who still has their brain! The things I'd do with you, if I were in command of the parasite piloting you.

MistressOfSouls_RecognizeDarkUrge_59.speaker: Kressa Bonedaughter
MistressOfSouls_RecognizeDarkUrge_59.text: I think we have to put you down, though, dear one.

MistressOfSouls_RecognizeDarkUrge_35.speaker: Kressa Bonedaughter
MistressOfSouls_RecognizeDarkUrge_35.text: Something must have gone wrong for you to have wandered all the way back here... even if it is pleasant to be reunited.

MistressOfSouls_RecognizeDarkUrge_2.speaker: Kressa Bonedaughter
MistressOfSouls_RecognizeDarkUrge_2.text: This won't hurt a bit, though I don't suppose you can feel much now, anyway.

MistressOfSouls_RecognizeDarkUrge_38.speaker: Kressa Bonedaughter
MistressOfSouls_RecognizeDarkUrge_38.text: Oh, it pains to hear you speak such words against one who adored tending to you so.

MistressOfSouls_RecognizeDarkUrge_0.speaker: Kressa Bonedaughter
MistressOfSouls_RecognizeDarkUrge_0.text: Why bother to tell you this, though? You surely can't understand.

MistressOfSouls_RecognizeDarkUrge_11.speaker: GROUP_ORI_DU
MistressOfSouls_RecognizeDarkUrge_11.text: My mind may be gone, but my blade is sharp!

AD_Blessing_1.speaker: Kressa Bonedaughter
AD_Blessing_1.text: Bring death, embrace death, become death.

AD_Blessing_0.speaker: Kressa Bonedaughter
AD_Blessing_0.text: You are the sacred hand that reaches from the grave.

AD_Blessing_5.speaker: Kressa Bonedaughter
AD_Blessing_5.text: You are the lasher of skulls, the carver of crypts, the dancer of bones.

AD_Blessing_2.speaker: Kressa Bonedaughter
AD_Blessing_2.text: Walk in dusk and shadow - walk the path of bones in our Lord's name.

AD_Blessing_4.speaker: Kressa Bonedaughter
AD_Blessing_4.text: This is his blessing, his consecration, and you are his scythe. Go forth and reap.

MistressOfSouls_InterruptBlessing_7.speaker: Kressa Bonedaughter
MistressOfSouls_InterruptBlessing_7.text: Halt. Who are you, pretty dead thing, that interrupts this consecration of the undying?

MistressOfSouls_InterruptBlessing_17.speaker: Kressa Bonedaughter
MistressOfSouls_InterruptBlessing_17.text: Halt. Who are you, warm of blood and quick of heart, that interrupts this consecration of the undying?

MistressOfSouls_InterruptBlessing_1.speaker: Player
MistressOfSouls_InterruptBlessing_1.text: Apologies - I didn't mean to interrupt.

MistressOfSouls_InterruptBlessing_8.speaker: Kressa Bonedaughter
MistressOfSouls_InterruptBlessing_8.text: And yet you did. Answer me - who are you?

MistressOfSouls_InterruptBlessing_9.speaker: Kressa Bonedaughter
MistressOfSouls_InterruptBlessing_9.text: The order to leave has been given, True Soul. Report to the ships and leave us be.

MistressOfSouls_InterruptBlessing_6.speaker: Player
MistressOfSouls_InterruptBlessing_6.text: I am unworthy of your notice - a nobody.

MistressOfSouls_InterruptBlessing_13.speaker: Kressa Bonedaughter
MistressOfSouls_InterruptBlessing_13.text: Tsk. A defective thrall that should have had its tongue removed.

MistressOfSouls_InterruptBlessing_11.speaker: Kressa Bonedaughter
MistressOfSouls_InterruptBlessing_11.text: Return to Balthazar - he may be able to correct your defects.

MistressOfSouls_InterruptBlessing_14.speaker: Kressa Bonedaughter
MistressOfSouls_InterruptBlessing_14.text: We are preparing to leave. Make yourself useful below.

MistressOfSouls_InterruptBlessing_3.speaker: Kressa Bonedaughter
MistressOfSouls_InterruptBlessing_3.text: And yet I have noticed you, and I do not like what I see.

MistressOfSouls_InterruptBlessing_2.speaker: Kressa Bonedaughter
MistressOfSouls_InterruptBlessing_2.text: Come - I will make better use of your bones than you do.

MistressOfSouls_InterruptBlessing_16.speaker: Player
MistressOfSouls_InterruptBlessing_16.text: Let's find out how 'undying' you really are.
